snippet: Libya has banned overnight car traffic in the eastern city of Benghazi to try to stem rising violence and anarchy, security officials said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Libya Bans Car Traffic at Night in Benghazi to Stem Violence
headline.main: Libya Bans Car Traffic at Night in Benghazi to Stem Violence

lead_paragraph: Libya has banned overnight car traffic in the eastern city of Benghazi to try to stem rising violence and anarchy, security officials said on Monday.
